England: King John was excommunicated from the Catholic Church by Pope Innocent III.
Spain: Albigensian Crusade: The pope Pope Innocent III called for a crusade to exterminate Catharism in Languedoc.
Vietnam: The general Quách Bốc entered the capital, dethroned Lý Cao Tông and installed his young son Lý Thẩm as emperor.
